name: Tomorrow.io API
description: Tomorrow.io weather intelligence API. Tomorrow.io collects, aggregates and processes meteorological and other relevant weather data, then offers access to it via the API. This includes data like: temperature, humidity, wind Speed, precipitation, cloud cover, visibility and much more.

SDGs.evidenceText: Weather intelligence is a critical input for predicting and managing weather and climate related risk. Accessible weather intelligence could lift billions from poverty
